ask.name: ask
ask.description: Give the AI the question to answer.

push.name: push
push.description: Push a user away from you by a distance.

pull.name: pull
pull.description: Pull a user toward you by a distance.

randomtp.name: randomtp
randomtp.description: Randomly teleport a user in the room.

swap.name: swap
swap.description: Swap the positions of two users.

stack.name: stack
stack.description: Stack users on top of each other.

line.name: line
line.description: Arrange users in a line in a direction with spacing.

unstuck.name: unstuck
unstuck.description: Spread users out horizontally to unstuck them.

portals.name: portals
portals.description: Save or remove portal locations (room name to room ID mappings). Usage: !portals save <name> <room_id>, !portals remove <name>

use.name: use
use.description: Move the bot to the specified entity's anchor 0. Usage: !use <entity_id>

entity.name: entity
entity.description: Save the entity id you are currently anchored to. Usage: !entity save <name>

entities.name: entities
entities.description: List all saved entity names and ids. Usage: !entities
